Posts.Content: Apr 12, 2012 11:03PM Channie wrote: Oh my goodness.  I do not know you but I would like to send my sympathy with love and prayers for you and your family.  Sisters are truly wonderful.  I was diagnosed with breast cancer 5 1/2 years ago and my irreplacable sister was by my side every step of the way.  I love her so very much and am so thankful to have her as my sister and my best friend.  I know you will miss your sister very much.  I pray for peace for you so you are able to get rest and keep yourself healthy.
Posts.Title: My Sister Passed Away Tonight Curlylocks kaycancer
